metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: Fast-paced British crime comedy with dark humor and memorable characters, similar to In Bruges and Seven Psychopaths.

metas.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
metas.description: Another Guy Ritchie classic, filled with witty dialogue, quirky criminals, and unexpected twists, aligning with the user's appreciation for crime comedies.

metas.name: Reservoir Dogs
metas.description: A classic crime thriller with Tarantino's signature dialogue and non-linear storytelling, appealing to fans of Inglourious Basterds and Get Shorty.

metas.name: Pulp Fiction
metas.description: A must-see for fans of crime and dark humor, with a similar tone and style to the movies already watched.

metas.name: Burn After Reading
metas.description: A Coen Brothers dark comedy with a stellar cast and absurd plot, reminiscent of the humor in In Bruges and Seven Psychopaths.

metas.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
metas.description: A satirical black comedy about the Cold War, blending dark humor with serious themes like Three Kings and Inglourious Basterds.

metas.name: War Dogs
metas.description: A dark comedy based on a true story about arms dealers during the Iraq War, combining war themes with comedic elements like Three Kings.

metas.name: The Guard
metas.description: An Irish dark comedy with a dry wit and a quirky protagonist, similar to In Bruges.

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: A neo-noir action comedy with witty dialogue and a self-aware tone, aligning with the user's preference for crime comedies.

metas.name: Bad Times at the El Royale
metas.description: A stylish thriller with a great ensemble cast and a compelling mystery, appealing to fans of crime and suspense.

metas.name: Looper
metas.description: Combines elements of sci-fi, thriller, and action with a clever time travel plot, which might be of interest to the user due to their enjoyment of action and thriller movies.

metas.name: District 9
metas.description: A sci-fi thriller with social commentary and intense action, similar to some of the war and thriller movies watched.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: A sci-fi action film with a time-looping premise and plenty of humor, similar to The Running Man.

metas.name: Arrival
metas.description: A thought-provoking sci-fi drama with a focus on communication and understanding, potentially appealing to fans of character-driven thrillers.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: A dark and suspenseful thriller with strong performances and a gripping plot, appealing to fans of the Shawshank Redemption.

metas.name: Wind River
metas.description: A crime thriller set in a Native American reservation, with a focus on atmosphere and character development, aligning with the user's preference for thrillers.

metas.name: Hell or High Water
metas.description: A neo-western crime drama with strong performances and a compelling story about brotherhood and desperation, similar to some of the crime movies watched.

metas.name: Sicario
metas.description: A gritty and intense crime thriller exploring the complexities of the war on drugs, aligning with the user's preference for thrillers.

metas.name: No Country for Old Men
metas.description: A Coen Brothers masterpiece, a dark and suspenseful crime thriller with memorable characters, similar to the movies watched.

metas.name: Parasite
metas.description: A critically acclaimed dark comedy thriller with social commentary and unexpected twists, aligning with the user's preference for crime comedies.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: A British horror comedy that blends gore with humor effectively, appealing to fans of horror and comedy.

metas.name: Zombieland
metas.description: A fun and lighthearted zombie comedy with memorable characters, blending horror and comedy elements.

metas.name: Train to Busan
metas.description: A fast-paced and intense zombie thriller set on a train, similar to 28 Days Later and 28 Weeks Later.

metas.name: The Babadook
metas.description: A psychological horror film with a focus on atmosphere and character development, appealing to fans of character-driven thrillers.

metas.name: It Follows
metas.description: A stylish and suspenseful horror film with a unique premise and a haunting atmosphere, aligning with the user's preference for thrillers.

metas.name: Tucker & Dale vs Evil
metas.description: A horror-comedy that cleverly subverts genre tropes, appealing to fans of dark humor and horror.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: A hilarious mockumentary about vampire roommates, blending comedy and horror elements effectively.

metas.name: Ready or Not
metas.description: A dark comedy horror film with plenty of suspense and gore, appealing to fans of horror and comedy.

metas.name: Happy Death Day
metas.description: A horror film with a time loop premise, blending suspense with comedic elements, aligning with the user's preference for thriller movies.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: A buddy cop action comedy with witty dialogue and a fun mystery, appealing to fans of crime comedies.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: A surprisingly heartwarming and funny film with broad appeal and clever humor. It shares a similar tone to Night Is Short, Walk On Girl.

metas.name: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
metas.description: A quirky and heartwarming adventure comedy with a unique sense of humor. The movie has a comparable style with In Bruges.

metas.name: Swiss Army Man
metas.description: An odd and funny film that resonates with the bizarre comedy from KPop Demon Hunters and the fantasy genre from The Meteor Man.

metas.description: An action comedy with fantastical elements and slapstick humor. Echoes the whimsical nature of KPop Demon Hunters.

metas.name: Dog Day Afternoon
metas.description: Classic crime thriller, with a strong emphasis on character development, as with In Bruges and Seven Psychopaths.

metas.name: Logan Lucky

metas.name: Baby Driver

metas.name: Dredd

metas.name: Hardcore Henry

metas.name: Attack the Block
